IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: DETROIT FRIENDSHIP HOUSE PROVIDES FOOD TO LOW-INCOME RESIDENTS OF HAMTRAMCK, MICHIGAN
IRS990.MissionDesc: DETROIT FRIENDSHIP HOUSE MEETS THE BASIC NEEDS OF LOW-INCOME RESIDENTS OF HAMTRAMCK, MI. THIS ASSISTANCE INCLUDES FOOD, CLOTHING, BABY SUPPLIES AND SCHOOL SUPPLIES.
IRS990.Desc: HARVEST HOUSE: DETROIT FRIENDSHIP HOUSE'S PRIMARY PROGRAM IS A FOOD PANTRY THAT PROVIDES THE LOW-INCOME RESIDENTS OF HAMTRAMCK, MI WITH SEVERAL DAYS' WORTH OF FOOD EACH MONTH FOR EACH MEMBER OF A FAMILY. SPECIAL HOLIDAY MEALS ARE ALSO PROVIDED FOR THANKSGIVING, EASTER AND CHRISTMAS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Schedule D, Part V, Line 4 - THE ENDOWMENT FUND IS USED TO FINANCIALLY SUPPORT THE PROGRAMS OF DETROIT FRIENDSHIP HOUSE.

FoodInventoryGrp.MethodOfDeterminingRevenuesTxt: 625,316 lbs of food at $1.70 per pound

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Schedule M, Part I, Line 33 - SCHEDULE M: SUPPLEMENTAL INFORMATION DETROIT FRIENDSHIP HOUSE RECEIVES FOOD DONATIONS REGULARLY THROUGHOUT THE YEAR FROM GLEANERS COMMUNITY FOOD BANK, A NON-PROFIT THAT SUPPLIES FOOD TO FOOD PANTRIES. WE VALUED DONATED FOOD AT $1.70 PER POUND..
This 990 is amended to reflect adjustments made during the FY2022 audit.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 11b
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 11b - FORM 990, PART VI, LINE 11B - ORGANIZATION'S PROCESS TO REVIEW FORM 990. THE 990 IS SENT TO THE DIRECTORS FOR REVIEW AFTER IT IS FILED WITH THE IRS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 12c
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 12c - FORM 990, PART VI, LINE 12C - ENFORCEMENT OF CONFLICTS OF POLICY. EACH DIRECTOR SIGNS A CONFILCT OF INTEREST FORM ANNUALLY. THE CHAIR OF THE BOARD VERIFIES THIS TASK IS COMPLETED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 15 - FORM 990, PART VI, LINE15 - COMPENSATION PROCESS FOR TOP OFFICIAL. THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE, WHICH CONSISTS OF THE CHAIR, SECRETARY, & TREASURER REVIEW EMPLOYEE COMPENSATION. COMPENSATION IS INCLUDED IN THE BUDGET WHICH IS APPROVED BY THE FULL BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, Line 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, Line 19 - FORM 990, PART VI, LINE 19 - GOVERNING DOCUMENTS DISCLOSURE EXPLANATION. THE GOVERNING DOCUMENTS ARE STORED AT THE DETROIT FRIENDSHIP HOUSE OFFICES IN HAMTRAMCK. THEY ARE PROVIDED TO THOSE WHO MAKE A WRITTEN REQUEST.

ReasonableCauseExplanation.ExplanationTxt: This is an amended return. The original 990 was filed on time.
